<small>Aramaic form: **<big>[[H7512|רְפַס]]</big>**</small>
 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָפַס‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָפַשׂ‎</span> **verb** ==stamp, tread, foul by stamping, treading== (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָפַס‎</span> ***tread***, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***kick***); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתִּרְפֹּס‎</span> [[Ezek.32.2|Ezek 32:2]], with accusative rivers; 2 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּרְפּשֹׁ֑וּן‎</span> [[Ezek.34.18|Ezek 34:18]]. **Niph\`al** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַעְיָן נִרְפָּשׂ‎</span> [[Prov.25.26|Prov 25:26]] ***a fountain befouled.*** **Hithpa\`el** (***stamp oneself down***, then figurative), ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִתְרַפֵּס‎</span> [[Prov.6.3|Prov 6:3]] ***humble thyself***, become a suppliant ([[BDB#RV|RVm]] Toy ***bestir thyself***, as conjecture); ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִתְרַפֵּס בְּרַצֵּי כָ֑סֶף‎</span> [[Ps.68.31|Ps 68:31]] ***stamping, trampling, down pieces of silver*** (?), obscure and probably corrupt, see conjectures in [[BDB#Bae|Bae]] and others and <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פַּתְרֹס‎</span> above, near the end
